, publish, :, June, 22, ,, 2016, 9:37, a.m., ET, Duration, risk, sneak, into, portfolio, as, yield, tumble, by, in, a, world, where, over, $, 10, trillion, in, government, debt, sport, negative, yield, ,, desperate, investor, be, run, out, of, option, to, ensure, even, meager, return, ., as, a, result, ,, they, may, be, take, on, a, big, risk, without, even, realize, it, ., most, investor, ,, for, example, ,, understand, that, buy, junk, bond, ,, which, have, low, credit, rating, in, exchange, for, higher, yield, ,, involve, take, on, more, risk, ., but, talk, about, the, risk, of, extended, duration, and, ``, most, retail, investor, will, not, even, know, what, that, be, ,, '', say, Kathy, Jones, ,, chief, fixed-income, strategist, at, Schwab, Center, for, Financial, Research, ., yet, duration, risk, have, be, grow, fast, across, the, world, and, be, now, cite, by, analyst, as, one, of, the, main, risk, threaten, fixed-income, portfolio, --, with, BlackRock, 's, strategist, go, as, far, as, call, it, one, of, the, reason, that, make, the, current, bond, market, riskier, than, the, market, that, precede, the, so-called, taper, tantrum, in, 2013, ., in, short, ,, duration, measure, how, much, bond, price, change, in, response, to, a, change, in, yield, -lrb-, debt, price, rise, as, yield, fall, and, vice, versa, -rrb-, ., the, risk, have, become, more, pronounced, as, government, bond, around, the, world, tumble, to, record, low, and, ,, in, some, case, ,, negative, territory, ., that, force, investor, to, buy, longer-dated, bond, to, maintain, necessary, level, of, return, ., the, danger, for, unsuspecting, bondholder, ,, however, ,, be, that, they, could, be, surprise, by, the, size, of, the, hit, those, return, take, once, interest, rate, start, to, rise, ., the, average, duration, of, Barclays, U.S., Aggregate, Bond, Index, be, 5.54, on, Tuesday, ,, slightly, higher, than, the, 10-year, average, of, 4.93, ., but, the, absolute, number, do, not, tell, the, whole, story, ., as, the, follow, chart, show, ,, duration, have, in, fact, be, on, a, constant, rise, over, the, past, several, year, ,, recently, reach, a, one-year, high, and, approach, its, highest, level, in, a, decade, ., so, ,, duration, be, a, complex, measure, that, estimate, just, how, much, bond, price, will, change, as, the, yield, rise, or, fall, ., for, example, ,, the, price, of, a, bond, with, a, five-year, duration, would, fall, by, 5, %, if, its, yield, go, up, 1, %, ., overall, ,, the, longer, the, maturity, of, a, bond, ,, the, longer, the, duration, and, the, higher, the, duration, risk, ., for, instance, ,, accord, to, one, calculation, ,, for, a, 20, %, drop, in, price, ,, it, would, take, a, 250-basis-point, rise, in, the, yield, of, a, 10-year, bond, but, only, a, 75-basis-point, rise, in, the, yield, of, a, 50-year, bond, ., one, basis, point, be, equal, to, one, hundredth, of, a, percentage, point, ., thing, get, even, more, risky, when, yield, be, already, at, historically, low, level, ,, Jones, say, ,, as, even, a, few-basis-point, move, in, a, bond, that, be, yield, near, zero, could, be, a, significant, change, ,, send, its, price, plummet, ., yield, have, drop, around, the, world, --, with, the, 10-year, Treasury, yield, tmubmusd10y, ,, -1.47, %, fall, last, week, to, a, nearly, four-year, low, --, as, investor, flock, to, government, debt, amid, a, global, flight, to, quality, fuel, by, central-bank, stimulus, ,, jitters, about, a, potential, U.K., exit, from, the, European, Union, and, widespread, worry, about, slow, economic, growth, ., the, government, bond, rally, have, bring, many, benchmark, yield, to, record, low, and, even, negative, territory, ,, most, notably, the, 10-year, german, bond, yield, tmbmkde-10y, ,, +22.31, %, know, as, the, bund, ,, which, spend, three, session, in, negative, territory, last, week, for, the, first, time, in, history, ., in, Switzerland, ,, the, yield, on, the, country, 's, , publish, :, June, 21, ,, 2016, 6:33, a.m., ET, by, while, the, economy, have, improve, ,, lot, of, folk, be, still, look, for, work, ., you, may, be, in, that, category, ,, or, you, may, simply, be, look, for, a, better, job, ., either, way, ,, there, be, time, when, you, can, claim, federal, income, tax, deduction, for, job, hunting, expense, and, when, you, can, not, ., you, can, only, deduct, cost, to, look, for, work, in, you, current, occupation, weirdly, ,, you, can, only, write, off, expense, to, search, for, a, job, that, be, in, the, same, occupation, as, the, last, one, you, have, --, or, the, one, you, still, have, if, you, be, look, for, a, better, gig, ., so, what, do, this, ``, same, occupation, rule, '', really, mean, ?, to, answer, that, question, ,, focus, on, the, nature, of, the, work, perform, rather, than, more, nebulous, thing, like, job, title, ., for, example, ,, if, you, last, job, be, work, as, a, lawyer, for, a, law, firm, ,, get, a, job, in, a, corporate, legal, department, would, be, consider, stay, in, the, same, occupation, ., on, the, other, hand, ,, get, a, marketing, position, with, another, law, firm, would, not, pass, the, same, occupation, test, ,, so, job, hunting, expense, in, that, scenario, would, be, nondeductible, ., expense, incur, by, a, new, high, school, or, college, graduate, look, for, first-time, employment, be, generally, not, deductible, because, you, be, consider, to, be, seek, a, new, occupation, by, definition, ., however, if, you, do, enough, part-time, or, full-time, work, while, in, school, to, establish, a, occupation, ,, I, think, you, can, deduct, post-graduation, expense, to, search, for, another, job, in, the, same, field, ., you, can, also, deduct, expense, to, look, for, a, new, job, in, the, same, field, when, you, be, temporarily, work, in, another, occupation, just, to, pay, the, bill, ., for, example, ,, say, you, lose, you, job, as, a, software, designer, ,, and, you, be, now, work, temporarily, -lrb-, you, hope, -rrb-, as, a, restaurant, server, ., you, can, deduct, expense, to, look, for, a, new, job, in, the, software, design, business, ., in, a, historic, first, attempt, to, fly, around, the, world, in, a, solar-powered, plane, ,, Solar, Impulse, 2, begin, its, journey, across, the, Atlantic, after, it, take, off, from, New, York, ., the, flight, to, Spain, be, expect, to, take, pilot, Bertrand, Piccard, four, day, non-stop, ., how, and, when, to, deduct, job-search, expense, if, you, can, clear, the, initial, same, occupation, hurdle, ,, you, can, potentially, deduct, some, of, you, job, hunting, expense, --, after, consider, other, limitation, explain, later, --, even, if, you, search, prove, futile, ., common, example, of, deductible, job, hunting, expense, include, employment, agency, and, headhunter, fee, ,, employment, counseling, fee, ,, travel, cost, -lrb-, include, 50, %, of, meal, while, out, of, town, -rrb-, ,, and, fee, for, resume, preparation, assistance, ., if, you, drive, locally, in, connection, with, you, employment, search, -lrb-, say, for, job, interview, -rrb-, ,, you, can, deduct, the, IRS, business, mileage, allowance, -lrb-, 54, cent, per, mile, for, 2016, -rrb-, ., Ditto, of, you, drive, out, of, town, for, job, hunting, reason, ., but, keep, this, in, mind, :, transportation, expense, to, go, out, of, town, -lrb-, whether, by, plane, ,, train, ,, or, automobile, -rrb-, be, only, deductible, if, the, primary, reason, for, the, trip, be, job, hunting, ., so, if, you, fly, out, to, hang, with, you, sister, in, Boulder, for, a, month, and, play, lot, of, golf, while, mix, in, some, random, job, search, ,, forget, about, deduct, the, airfare, to, and, from, Boulder, ., also, forget, about, claim, that, the, cost, of, haircut, ,, makeover, ,, gym, membership, ,, and, new, clothes, be, somehow, relate, to, you, job, search, ., the, IRS, will, not, buy, the, argument, even, though, truth, and, justice, may, actually, be, on, you, side, ., same, for, mobile, device, service, charge, and, internet, access, charge, ., even, though, these, service, be, basically, mandatory, in, today, 's, job, search, environment, ,, the, IRS, will, say, they, be, nondeductible, personal, expense, that, you, would, have, incur, with, or, without, the, job, search, ., last, but, not, least, ,, you, can, not, deduct, expense, that, you, incur, this, year, if, they, be, reimburse, by, a, prospective, or, future, employer, this, year, ., on, the, other, hand, ,, if, you, receive, reimbursement, for, this, year, 's, expense, next, year, ,, you, must, report, income, on, next, year, 's, return, equal, to, the, amount, you, be, able, to, deduct, on, this, year, 's, return, ., here, be, the, big, catch, when, it, come, to, job, search, expense, :, you, must, treat, the, total, amount, of, you, expense, as, a, miscellaneous, itemized, deduction, item, ., that, mean, you, get, no, tax-saving, benefit, unless, you, itemize, ., even, if, you, do, ,, miscellaneous, itemized, deduction, be, only, allow, to, the, extent, they, exceed, 2, %, of, you, adjusted, gross, income, -lrb-, agi, -rrb-, when, combine, with, certain, other, miscellaneous, deduction, like, fee, for, tax, advice, and, tax, preparation, and, investment, expense, ., -lrb-, agi, be, the, number, on, the, last, line, of, the, first, page, of, you, form, 1040, ., it, include, all, taxable, income, item, and, select, write-off, such, as, the, one, for, IRA, contribution, and, move, expense, ., -rrb-, the, sad, truth, be, the, 2, %, -, of, -, agi, threshold, be, a, lot, easier, to, clear, when, you, income, be, low, because, you, have, be, out, of, work, or, underemployed, for, a, big, chunk, of, the, year, ., the, , publish, :, June, 21, ,, 2016, 6:33, a.m., ET, by, while, the, economy, have, improve, ,, lot, of, folk, be, still, look, for, work, ., you, may, be, in, that, category, ,, or, you, may, simply, be, look, for, a, better, job, ., either, way, ,, there, be, time, when, you, can, claim, federal, income, tax, deduction, for, job, hunting, expense, and, when, you, can, not, ., you, can, only, deduct, cost, to, look, for, work, in, you, current, occupation, weirdly, ,, you, can, only, write, off, expense, to, search, for, a, job, that, be, in, the, same, occupation, as, the, last, one, you, have, --, or, the, one, you, still, have, if, you, be, look, for, a, better, gig, ., so, what, do, this, ``, same, occupation, rule, '', really, mean, ?, to, answer, that, question, ,, focus, on, the, nature, of, the, work, perform, rather, than, more, nebulous, thing, like, job, title, ., for, example, ,, if, you, last, job, be, work, as, a, lawyer, for, a, law, firm, ,, get, a, job, in, a, corporate, legal, department, would, be, consider, stay, in, the, same, occupation, ., on, the, other, hand, ,, get, a, marketing, position, with, another, law, firm, would, not, pass, the, same, occupation, test, ,, so, job, hunting, expense, in, that, scenario, would, be, nondeductible, ., expense, incur, by, a, new, high, school, or, college, graduate, look, for, first-time, employment, be, generally, not, deductible, because, you, be, consider, to, be, seek, a, new, occupation, by, definition, ., however, if, you, do, enough, part-time, or, full-time, work, while, in, school, to, establish, a, occupation, ,, I, think, you, can, deduct, post-graduation, expense, to, search, for, another, job, in, the, same, field, ., you, can, also, deduct, expense, to, look, for, a, new, job, in, the, same, field, when, you, be, temporarily, work, in, another, occupation, just, to, pay, the, bill, ., for, example, ,, say, you, lose, you, job, as, a, software, designer, ,, and, you, be, now, work, temporarily, -lrb-, you, hope, -rrb-, as, a, restaurant, server, ., you, can, deduct, expense, to, look, for, a, new, job, in, the, software, design, business, ., in, a, historic, first, attempt, to, fly, around, the, world, in, a, solar-powered, plane, ,, Solar, Impulse, 2, begin, its, journey, across, the, Atlantic, after, it, take, off, from, New, York, ., the, flight, to, Spain, be, expect, to, take, pilot, Bertrand, Piccard, four, day, non-stop, ., how, and, when, to, deduct, job-search, expense, if, you, can, clear, the, initial, same, occupation, hurdle, ,, you, can, potentially, deduct, some, of, you, job, hunting, expense, --, after, consider, other, limitation, explain, later, --, even, if, you, search, prove, futile, ., common, example, of, deductible, job, hunting, expense, include, employment, agency, and, headhunter, fee, ,, employment, counseling, fee, ,, travel, cost, -lrb-, include, 50, %, of, meal, while, out, of, town, -rrb-, ,, and, fee, for, resume, preparation, assistance, ., if, you, drive, locally, in, connection, with, you, employment, search, -lrb-, say, for, job, interview, -rrb-, ,, you, can, deduct, the, IRS, business, mileage, allowance, -lrb-, 54, cent, per, mile, for, 2016, -rrb-, ., Ditto, of, you, drive, out, of, town, for, job, hunting, reason, ., but, keep, this, in, mind, :, transportation, expense, to, go, out, of, town, -lrb-, whether, by, plane, ,, train, ,, or, automobile, -rrb-, be, only, deductible, if, the, primary, reason, for, the, trip, be, job, hunting, ., so, if, you, fly, out, to, hang, with, you, sister, in, Boulder, for, a, month, and, play, lot, of, golf, while, mix, in, some, random, job, search, ,, forget, about, deduct, the, airfare, to, and, from, Boulder, ., also, forget, about, claim, that, the, cost, of, haircut, ,, makeover, ,, gym, membership, ,, and, new, clothes, be, somehow, relate, to, you, job, search, ., the, IRS, will, not, buy, the, argument, even, though, truth, and, justice, may, actually, be, on, you, side, ., same, for, mobile, device, service, charge, and, internet, access, charge, ., even, though, these, service, be, basically, mandatory, in, today, 's, job, search, environment, ,, the, IRS, will, say, they, be, nondeductible, personal, expense, that, you, would, have, incur, with, or, without, the, job, search, ., last, but, not, least, ,, you, can, not, deduct, expense, that, you, incur, this, year, if, they, be, reimburse, by, a, prospective, or, future, employer, this, year, ., on, the, other, hand, ,, if, you, receive, reimbursement, for, this, year, 's, expense, next, year, ,, you, must, report, income, on, next, year, 's, return, equal, to, the, amount, you, be, able, to, deduct, on, this, year, 's, return, ., here, be, the, big, catch, when, it, come, to, job, search, expense, :, you, must, treat, the, total, amount, of, you, expense, as, a, miscellaneous, itemized, deduction, item, ., that, mean, you, get, no, tax-saving, benefit, unless, you, itemize, ., even, if, you, do, ,, miscellaneous, itemized, deduction, be, only, allow, to, the, extent, they, exceed, 2, %, of, you, adjusted, gross, income, -lrb-, agi, -rrb-, when, combine, with, certain, other, miscellaneous, deduction, like, fee, for, tax, advice, and, tax, preparation, and, investment, expense, ., -lrb-, agi, be, the, number, on, the, last, line, of, the, first, page, of, you, form, 1040, ., it, include, all, taxable, income, item, and, select, write-off, such, as, the, one, for, IRA, contribution, and, move, expense, ., -rrb-, the, sad, truth, be, the, 2, %, -, of, -, agi, threshold, be, a, lot, easier, to, clear, when, you, income, be, low, because, you, have, be, out, of, work, or, underemployed, for, a, big, chunk, of, the, year, ., the, variable-rate, loan, at, this, time, ., the, Mortgage, Bankers, Association, estimate, the, median, price, for, a, new, home, sell, in, the, U.S., this, year, will, be, $, 294,600, ,, and, that, the, 52,000, ,, so, you, will, borrow, $, 208,000, ., you, will, also, have, to, cover, the, cost, associate, with, purchase, the, home, and, take, out, the, loan, ., these, close, cost, typically, range, from, 2, %, to, 5, %, of, the, purchase, price, ,, accord, to, Zillow, ., if, you, be, a, first-time, home, buyer, ,, this, can, be, a, brutal, surprise, ., accord, to, Bankrate.com, ,, the, average, rate, --, possibly, the, lowest, you, will, see, in, you, lifetime, ., of, course, ,, you, personal, situation, may, not, make, this, a, ideal, time, to, lock, in, a, low, rate, ,, but, the, number, will, be, considerably, higher, than, these, rate, ., for, simplicity, ,, we, will, round, the, interest, rate, for, we, example, to, 3.65, %, for, the, 30-year, loan, and, 2.70, %, for, the, 15-year, loan, ., 30-year, vs., 15-year, loan, base, on, we, purchase, price, of, $, 260,000, ,, the, 20, %, down, payment, of, $, 52,000, ,, loan, amount, of, $, 208,000, and, interest, rate, of, 3.70, %, ,, the, monthly, principal, and, interest, -lrb-, p&i, -rrb-, payment, for, the, 30-year, loan, be, $, 957.39, ., you, might, be, ready, to, celebrate, ,, but, keep, in, mind, this, do, not, include, any, monthly, escrow, payment, for, insurance, and, tax, that, will, be, require, by, the, lender, ., of, course, ,, you, will, also, have, the, escrow, payment, with, the, 15-year, loan, ,, so, we, be, just, compare, P&I, here, ., with, a, interest, rate, of, 2.70, %, ,, the, monthly, P&I, payment, for, the, 15-year, loan, be, $, 1,406.59, ., detailed, comparison, many, people, have, a, terrible, habit, when, decide, on, home, or, car, purchase, of, only, consider, the, affordability, of, monthly, payment, ,, rather, than, the, entire, cost, for, the, life, of, a, loan, ., the, total, interest, pay, over, the, life, of, the, 30-year, loan, will, be, $, 136,659, ., total, interest, pay, over, the, life, of, the, 15-year, loan, will, be, just, $, 45,186, ., so, if, you, can,
